Class ImageBrowseAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ImageBrowseAdapter.ViewHolder>
com.example.employ_events.ui.adapter.ImageBrowseAdapter
public class ImageBrowseAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ImageBrowseAdapter.ViewHolder>
Adapter for managing and displaying a list of image in a RecyclerView
Author:
Aaron
